dmca.title: Big Screen Objects to "Armstrong" Copying
dmca.body:
To Whom it May Concern:

As per your request, I have formatted my DMCA complaint dated May 7,
2007 to conform with your submission guidelines.

1. This complaint covers the unauthorized images of actress Kimberley
Kates from the film "Armstrong.  We are filing this complaint on behalf
of the Copyright owner.  Please see the attached Cease and Desist
letter, and Library of Congress information, which will affirm our
authority to file this complaint.

2. The following links are in violation of DMCA.  Attached please find the letter from the owner of the copyright for the film in violation "Armstrong."  We are duly authorized to act on their behalf.

http://www.bitenova.nl/tt/f2s4b
 
http://www.btmon.com/Porn/Movies/Kimberley_Kates_naked_in_a_bathroom_vidcaps.torrent.html
 
http://www.torrentvalley.com/download_torrent_600405.html
 
The following links from Google Images and the search item "Kimberley Kates" are also in copyright violation of the film "Armstrong."  These are nude images of Kimberley Kates getting out of a shower and are being illegally used and in violation of the DMCA.  Attached you will find the Cease and Desist Letter as well as the Library of Congress information on the above-referenced film "Armstrong."  

http://images.google.com/imgres?imgurl=http://www.celebsmovies-online.com/m_pics/mq/tnKimberleyKates1.jpg&imgrefurl=http://www.celebsmovies-online.com/Kimberley-Kates-Nude/Kimberley-Kates.html&h=120&w=185&sz=6&hl=xx-elmer&start=2&sig2=m4pmrh0iUJPpky5Ia4BnUw&um=1&tbnid=fgU6mypVZRwI1M:&tbnh=66&tbnw=102&ei=Jew8RoqAEcLgiwGKqZmKAQ&prev=/images%3Fq%3D%2522kimberley%2Bkates%2522%26svnum%3D10%26um%3D1%26hl%3Dxx-elmer%26lr%3Dlang_en%26ie%3DUTF-8%26oe%3DISO-8859-1%26safe%3Doff%26sa%3DN
 
http://images.google.com/imgres?imgurl=http://www.freejoin.net/mb/celebrities/free/nude/gallery/k/kimberley_kates/images/tn_kimberley_kates-1.jpg&imgrefurl=http://www.freejoin.net/mb/celebrities/free/nude/pics/kimberley_kates.html&h=87&w=120&sz=5&hl=xx-elmer&start=10&sig2=gakLym_p1SA-1czfg__kVA&um=1&tbnid=LEF5pOI5J6qTdM:&tbnh=64&tbnw=88&ei=Jew8RoqAEcLgiwGKqZmKAQ&prev=/images%3Fq%3D%2522kimberley%2Bkates%2522%26svnum%3D10%26um%3D1%26hl%3Dxx-elmer%26lr%3Dlang_en%26ie%3DUTF-8%26oe%3DISO-8859-1%26safe%3Doff%26sa%3DN
	
http://images.google.com/imgres?imgurl=http://thumbs.videos2stars.com/v2s/853/4.jpg&imgrefurl=http://www.videos2stars.com/videos-kimberley-kates-309-1237.html&h=118&w=160&sz=8&hl=xx-elmer&start=5&sig2=zwXMc0ZTMnsHskdK9WjUmg&um=1&tbnid=8Gc13lHsPgWpUM:&tbnh=72&tbnw=98&ei=Jew8RoqAEcLgiwGKqZmKAQ&prev=/images%3Fq%3D%2522kimberley%2Bkates%2522%26svnum%3D10%26um%3D1%26hl%3Dxx-elmer%26lr%3Dlang_en%26ie%3DUTF-8%26oe%3DISO-8859-1%26safe%3Doff%26sa%3DN
 
Below are a number of other links that were found that are also in violation of copyright of the film
